pr_title: [LW] Fixes, 3: Additional logging towards fixing obscure bug

timeline.author: jkozlowski

replies.bodyText: Actually, scrap that, dunno if we want actual data lying around in the logs.
replies.author: jkozlowski

timeline.bodyText: I think you need the same change in CommitTimestampGetter?
timeline.author: jkozlowski

replies.bodyText: And probs extract a small method?
replies.author: jkozlowski

timeline.bodyText: Same here, I think you want unsafe arg for the events?
timeline.author: jkozlowski

timeline.bodyText:
This should be:
assertThatLoggableExceptionThrownBy(() -> eventCache.processStartTransactionsUpdate(TIMESTAMPS_2,
                LockWatchStateUpdate.success(LEADER, 5L, ImmutableList.of(UNLOCK_EVENT))))
                .isExactlyInstanceOf(SafeIllegalArgumentException.class)
                .hasLogMessage("Events missing between last snapshot and this batch of events");
timeline.author: jkozlowski
